start: I KNOW YOU’RE IN THERE SONNY! COME OUT AND GIVE ME MITTENS AND SNOWBALL BEFORE I CALL THE BBB ON YOU!
Oh my god, I can’t think between her and the jackhammer.
I WANT TO SPEAK TO LINDA, THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS, MEWTOPOLIS HAS NEVER TREATED ME LIKE THIS AND I WILL NOT STAND SUCH TREATMENT!!!
Please go away, please go away!
end: I didn't do it for you. Someone had to put them out of their misery.
